nodes.text: The buffer zone solution would not give me any confidence.
martinezcs(298): The buffer zone solution would not give me any confidence.
Annot: The buffer zone solution would not give me any confidence.
The time that my daughter had a reaction it was right after visiting the restroom.
martinezcs(298): The time that my daughter had a reaction it was right after visiting the restroom.
Annot: The time that my daughter had a reaction it was right after visiting the restroom.
In a buffer zone situation the person could still be exposed to peanut residue in other parts of the plane (e.g. the restroom door handle, sink faucet, etc).
martinezcs(298): In a buffer zone situation the person could still be exposed to peanut residue in other parts of the plane (e.g. the restroom door handle, sink faucet, etc).
Annot: In a buffer zone situation the person could still be exposed to peanut residue in other parts of the plane (e.g. the restroom door handle, sink faucet, etc).

Now we carry wipes and wipe down every surface in our seating area and in the restroom when we fly an airline like southwest that serves peanuts on previous flights even if they aren't serving it on ours.

martinezcs(298): Now we carry wipes and wipe down every surface in our seating area and in the restroom when we fly an airline like southwest that serves peanuts on previous flights even if they aren't serving it on ours.

Annot: Now we carry wipes and wipe down every surface in our seating area and in the restroom when we fly an airline like southwest that serves peanuts on previous flights even if they aren't serving it on ours.
Buffer zones do not help in common areas like bathrooms.
cmom(299): Buffer zones do not help in common areas like bathrooms.
Annot: Buffer zones do not help in common areas like bathrooms.
Also, that means that the persons prior to the flight ate peanuts there.
cmom(299): Also, that means that the persons prior to the flight ate peanuts there.
Annot: Also, that means that the persons prior to the flight ate peanuts there.
I mentioned on another discussion board that the flight crew pointed my son out and told passengers they could not have Peanut M&Ms because my son had an allergy.
cmom(299): I mentioned on another discussion board that the flight crew pointed my son out and told passengers they could not have Peanut M&Ms because my son had an allergy.
Annot: I mentioned on another discussion board that the flight crew pointed my son out and told passengers they could not have Peanut M&Ms because my son had an allergy.
The passengers were all nice about it
cmom(299): The passengers were all nice about it
Annot: The passengers were all nice about it
but it made me very uncomfortable.
cmom(299): but it made me very uncomfortable.
Annot: but it made me very uncomfortable.
I have seen people be really nasty about asking them not to do something because fo someone else.
cmom(299): I have seen people be really nasty about asking them not to do something because fo someone else.
Annot: I have seen people be really nasty about asking them not to do something because fo someone else.

I was told once when I booked a flight that the airline (I believe continental) didn't serve them anyone and after taking off found out that they DID still serve them and was told, when I voiced my concern that there was no guarantee.

c1r2mom(394): I was told once when I booked a flight that the airline (I believe continental) didn't serve them anyone and after taking off found out that they DID still serve them and was told, when I voiced my concern that there was no guarantee.

Annot: I was told once when I booked a flight that the airline (I believe continental) didn't serve them anyone and after taking off found out that they DID still serve them and was told, when I voiced my concern that there was no guarantee.

I am a person who is SEVERELY allergic and the passenger beside me who accepted the peanuts, hearing about my concern, could have cared less that his neighbor (me) was covering her nose with her sleeve for the entire 3hr flight with an inhaler in hand.

c1r2mom(394): I am a person who is SEVERELY allergic and the passenger beside me who accepted the peanuts, hearing about my concern, could have cared less that his neighbor (me) was covering her nose with her sleeve for the entire 3hr flight with an inhaler in hand.

Annot: I am a person who is SEVERELY allergic and the passenger beside me who accepted the peanuts, hearing about my concern, could have cared less that his neighbor (me) was covering her nose with her sleeve for the entire 3hr flight with an inhaler in hand.
While it will never be banned as a terminal they can have "Peanut Free" flights and advertise them that way...
c1r2mom(394): While it will never be banned as a terminal they can have "Peanut Free" flights and advertise them that way...
Annot: While it will never be banned as a terminal they can have "Peanut Free" flights and advertise them that way...
and I guarantee they will get more business.
c1r2mom(394): and I guarantee they will get more business.
Annot: and I guarantee they will get more business.
Anyone who flies that flight and agrees upon purchase of the tickets to abide by rules, should be fine if found with a product in violation.
c1r2mom(394): Anyone who flies that flight and agrees upon purchase of the tickets to abide by rules, should be fine if found with a product in violation.
Annot: Anyone who flies that flight and agrees upon purchase of the tickets to abide by rules, should be fine if found with a product in violation.
I mean afterall, if it wasn't a big deal, whiy would public schools and daycares be banning it across the US?
c1r2mom(394): I mean afterall, if it wasn't a big deal, whiy would public schools and daycares be banning it across the US?
Annot: I mean afterall, if it wasn't a big deal, whiy would public schools and daycares be banning it across the US?
I'm curious how much you fly each year?
Ksiddel(704): I'm curious how much you fly each year?
Annot: I'm curious how much you fly each year?
I've experienced tantrums from fully grown adults because they were restricted in their peanut consumption in daycare environments.
Gym(890): I've experienced tantrums from fully grown adults because they were restricted in their peanut consumption in daycare environments.
Annot: I've experienced tantrums from fully grown adults because they were restricted in their peanut consumption in daycare environments.
I'd rather not have this experience on a flight.
Gym(890): I'd rather not have this experience on a flight.
Annot: I'd rather not have this experience on a flight.
My daughter will only fly on peanutfree planes
Gym(890): My daughter will only fly on peanutfree planes
Annot: My daughter will only fly on peanutfree planes
(if peanut is on the ingredients list, the item should be banned.
Gym(890): (if peanut is on the ingredients list, the item should be banned.
Annot: (if peanut is on the ingredients list, the item should be banned.
Made in a peanut facility is fine
Gym(890): Made in a peanut facility is fine
Annot: Made in a peanut facility is fine
the allergic individual should know not to consume the item.
Gym(890): the allergic individual should know not to consume the item.
Annot: the allergic individual should know not to consume the item.
As far as I understand it, highly processed peanut oil is safe.)
Gym(890): As far as I understand it, highly processed peanut oil is safe.)
Annot: As far as I understand it, highly processed peanut oil is safe.)
Just read about a buffer zone, and the lavitories,
kelliann(422): Just read about a buffer zone, and the lavitories,
Annot: Just read about a buffer zone, and the lavitories,
good point,
kelliann(422): good point,
Annot: good point,
I also, know if Flight attendants eat these items with there hands it still would create a problem also,
kelliann(422): I also, know if Flight attendants eat these items with there hands it still would create a problem also,
Annot: I also, know if Flight attendants eat these items with there hands it still would create a problem also,
that is why no one has wanted to address this,
kelliann(422): that is why no one has wanted to address this,
Annot: that is why no one has wanted to address this,
that is why it is important that it is.
kelliann(422): that is why it is important that it is.
Annot: that is why it is important that it is.
How do you stop people from breing it one, and such that is ahard issue
kelliann(422): How do you stop people from breing it one, and such that is ahard issue
Annot: How do you stop people from breing it one, and such that is ahard issue
My 9 year old peanutallergic son had his last major exposure 2 years ago when he touched a smear of peanut butter left under a tabletop where someone else had touched.
elizwestley(376): My 9 year old peanutallergic son had his last major exposure 2 years ago when he touched a smear of peanut butter left under a tabletop where someone else had touched.
Annot: My 9 year old peanutallergic son had his last major exposure 2 years ago when he touched a smear of peanut butter left under a tabletop where someone else had touched.
He then wiped his hand on his jeans and then touched his ear and his cheek.
elizwestley(376): He then wiped his hand on his jeans and then touched his ear and his cheek.
Annot: He then wiped his hand on his jeans and then touched his ear and his cheek.
All without realizing it was peanut butter he'd touched.
elizwestley(376): All without realizing it was peanut butter he'd touched.
Annot: All without realizing it was peanut butter he'd touched.
He immediately broke out in horrible hives and I gave him benadryl and got him home, stripped and bathed.
elizwestley(376): He immediately broke out in horrible hives and I gave him benadryl and got him home, stripped and bathed.
Annot: He immediately broke out in horrible hives and I gave him benadryl and got him home, stripped and bathed.
All the while, I was watching for breathing problems and other signs of anaphylaxis.
elizwestley(376): All the while, I was watching for breathing problems and other signs of anaphylaxis.
Annot: All the while, I was watching for breathing problems and other signs of anaphylaxis.
This is why I don't support buffer zones alone.
elizwestley(376): This is why I don't support buffer zones alone.
Annot: This is why I don't support buffer zones alone.
They don't address peanuts stuck down in cushions, left in seatbacks or peanut product oils left, well, anywhere by earlier passengers/flights.
elizwestley(376): They don't address peanuts stuck down in cushions, left in seatbacks or peanut product oils left, well, anywhere by earlier passengers/flights.
Annot: They don't address peanuts stuck down in cushions, left in seatbacks or peanut product oils left, well, anywhere by earlier passengers/flights.
Your child had an unpleasant reaction.  NOT a dangerous one.
howie(351): Your child had an unpleasant reaction.  NOT a dangerous one.
Annot: Your child had an unpleasant reaction.  NOT a dangerous one.
This is not a life or death issue, it is only a matter of comfort.
howie(351): This is not a life or death issue, it is only a matter of comfort.
Annot: This is not a life or death issue, it is only a matter of comfort.
If a smear of peanut butter that got wiped on his face just caused hives, then there really isn't anything to be afraid of is there?
howie(351): If a smear of peanut butter that got wiped on his face just caused hives, then there really isn't anything to be afraid of is there?
Annot: If a smear of peanut butter that got wiped on his face just caused hives, then there really isn't anything to be afraid of is there?
The buffer zone does not work.
NMmom(747): The buffer zone does not work.
Annot: The buffer zone does not work.
if the allergy is severe enough to be airborne  the air in the airplane is circulated through the whole plane, not just the three rows in front and behind you.
NMmom(747): if the allergy is severe enough to be airborne  the air in the airplane is circulated through the whole plane, not just the three rows in front and behind you.
Annot: if the allergy is severe enough to be airborne  the air in the airplane is circulated through the whole plane, not just the three rows in front and behind you.
It also singles out the person
NMmom(747): It also singles out the person
Annot: It also singles out the person
and makes the people in the buffer zone upset that they had to sit there.
NMmom(747): and makes the people in the buffer zone upset that they had to sit there.
Annot: and makes the people in the buffer zone upset that they had to sit there.
